article_title: Keeping pets safe in hot temperatures
article_text: KAKE News On Your Side: Most all the dogs featured in the video are up for adoption from animal rescue group Dobe & Dog Rescue. The dogs were slated to be put down but the group rescued them and trains them to be adopted into people homes. The group is always looking for volunteers to foster the animals. If you would like to adopt one of the dogs featured in video, Click here to be redirected to the groups Facebook page. The groups owner, Carlene Hinton, can be reached at (316) 993-2652 or dobedogerescue@gmail.com. You can also reach Lori Gilbert at (316) 847-1482.

article_metadata.description: The dog days of summer are here, but are your pets dealing with the temperatures okay?
article_metadata.author: Bryan Ramsdale
